Package main

Class CustomersView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
main.CustomersView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersView extends javafx.application.Application implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The CustomersView controller. Created this to abvoid a casting issue I was having in Main with both appointments and customer updates
